title: Not Downloading on Mac?
body: I have had LoL on my Macbook Pro for about a year now, but recently, the game will not load anymore. When I click on the launcher, the logo shows up then I get an error message. I tried uninstalling then reinstalling the game, but now it will not let me even download the game from the website. I am relatively computer savvy, but this has stumped me and I really want to play. Any ideas?

replies.body: Hit us up through a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can take a closer look for you.  Attach any screenshots such as the error you are receiving, or any additional detail you might think of for more context.  We'll help out asap!
